General.Name: CJ Century Logistics Holdings Bhd
General.Description: CJ Century Logistics Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, provides supply chain solutions in Malaysia. The company operates in two segments, Total Logistics Services and Procurement Logistics Services. It offers integrated logistics services, including contract logistics, freight forwarding, transportation and distribution, and supply chain management consulting; and oil logistics services, such as ship-to-ship operation. The company also provides data management solutions comprising document management and data protection, physical and cloud storage, electronic document imaging and date management, document scanning, and digital storage; and electrical and electronics home appliances including LED TVs, air-conditioners, washing machines, refrigerators, freezers, and vacuum cleaners, as well as microwave ovens. In addition, it offers courier, haulage, and cleaning services, as well as trades in resins. The company was formerly known as Century Logistics Holdings Berhad and changed its name to CJ Century Logistics Holdings Berhad in May 2018. CJ Century Logistics Holdings Berhad was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Klang, Malaysia.
